title: Aara Amara Lyrics Nambiyaar Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Aara Amara 
Ukkanthu Nanba Nee Sarakka Podu..
Pidikkatha 
Periya Manishan Moonjiela
Nalla Oru Panchar Podu..
 Podu..Podra..

Marunaliku Paru 
Apidiyea Sarakku Meale Paliya Podu..
Evan Evana 
Thitanumo Ipadiyea Ipadiyea Dhittam Podu

Aara Amara
Ukkanthu Nanba Nee Sarakka Podu..
(Paa quater sollu..)
Pidikkatha 
Periya Manishan Moonjiela
Nalla Oru Panchar Podu.. 
Podu.. Podra..
(Chellam.. Vaa Chellam Ipdi Vaa..)

(ha.. ha.. ha..Hayyo.. Enna kalaichitarama..)

Saraku kuda 
Oru Vithathil Dhandavalam than...
Athula Eari Povom Pala Roadu..
Vandavalandhan..Vandavalandhan..
Vandavalandhan..Vandavalandhan..
Vanda..vaa..lanthan...

Halfu Ulla Pona.. 
Attam Styleh Veara..
Appatakkaru Dhaanea Ooril Enaku Pearu..
Aara Amara Ukkanthu Nanba Nee 
Sarakka Podu..Podu..Podra

Murikkikitu 
Irundhavanum Mutham koduppaan...
Inai Piriya Nanban Kuda ..
Etti Othaippan.. Etti Othaippan..
Etti Othaippan.. Etti Othaippan..
Etti..... Othai..ppaan..

Tukking Pannitu Povaan..
Trouser Kalandu Varuvan..
Poli Bantha Marayum..
Punitha Edam Ithu Than..

Aara Amara 
Ukkanthu Nanba Nee 
Sarakka Podu..Podu..Podra
Pidikkatha 
Periya Manishan Moonjiela
Nalla Oru Panchar Podu.. 
Podu.. Podra..
(Vaa raamu.. Sir Oru Nimisham)

seo.title: Aara Amara Lyrics Nambiyaar Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Aara Amara Lyrics Nambiyaar Song Lyrics from Nambiyaar. composed by Vijay Antony and sung by Santhanam. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Nambiyaar, Vijay Antony, Santhanam, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
